ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ($Profile.Name = "CoIT Bolivar Base Technician Profile" || $Profile.Name = "CoIT Proveedor Base Partner Bolivar") && ( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Travel") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "In Progress") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Completed") || ISPICKVAL(Status, "Canceled") || ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Status, "Travel") || ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Status, "In Progress") || ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Status, "Completed") || ISPICKVAL(FSSK__FSK_Work_Order__r.Status, "Canceled") ) && ( ISCHANGED(SchedStartTime) || ISCHANGED(FSSK__FSK_Assigned_Service_Resource__c) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: No Puedes Cambiar la Programacion de la Drop Off
